imdb.plot outline: What happens when you lose your job, a sale, or a boyfriend? In this multi-cultural comedy three of the most unlikely people end up under one roof forced into situations they would never expect to find themselves in. When all hell breaks loose, Dalong and Kim will discover that they must learn to accept each other and their cultural differences if they are going to survive their visit to the house on 3987 Spring Street.
imdb.title: 3987 Spring Street
